question: What is the place of the Russian Federation in terms of oil reserves in the world and in terms of gas in the world?
answer1: in terms of oil reserves, 10th place in the world, and in terms of gas, 3rd place
answer2: in terms of oil reserves, 7th place in the world, and in terms of gas, 1st place
answer3: 3rd place in the world in terms of oil reserves, and 2nd place in terms of gas
